title: Diamond and Dollar

This week on Case Closed, we begin with Escaped Convicts After Diamond, the July 9, 1949, episode of Richard Diamond, Private Detective.

(29:57) The second story this week is The Baldero Matter, from Yours Truly, Johnny Dollar. That episode originally aired March 15, 1959.
